name: Google Tasks
description: Manage Google Tasks - task lists, tasks, completion status
author: PalmClaw Team

tools.name: tasks_list_tasklists
tools.description: List all Google Task lists for the authenticated user. Returns each list's id, title, and updated timestamp.

tools.name: tasks_list_tasks
tools.description: List tasks in a specific task list. Returns id, title, status, due, notes, parent, and position for each task.

tasklist_id.description: The task list ID (use tasks_list_tasklists to find IDs)

max_results.description: Maximum number of tasks to return (default: 20, max: 100)

show_completed.description: Whether to include completed tasks (default: true)

show_hidden.description: Whether to include hidden/deleted tasks (default: false)

tools.name: tasks_get_task
tools.description: Get full details of a specific task by its ID, including title, notes, status, due date, and links.

tasklist_id.description: The task list ID containing the task

tools.name: tasks_create
tools.description: Create a new task in a task list. Supports setting title, notes, due date, and parent (for subtasks).

tasklist_id.description: The task list ID to create the task in

due.description: Due date in RFC 3339 format, e.g. '2026-02-20T00:00:00.000Z' (optional)

parent.description: Parent task ID to create this as a subtask (optional)

tools.name: tasks_update
tools.description: Update an existing task. Only specified fields will be changed. Use status 'completed' to mark done or 'needsAction' to reopen.

tasklist_id.description: The task list ID containing the task

due.description: New due date in RFC 3339 format (optional)

tasklist_id.description: The task list ID containing the task

task_id.description: The task ID to mark as completed

tools.name: tasks_delete
tools.description: Delete a task from a task list.

tasklist_id.description: The task list ID containing the task
